title: Three Star Brand Aromatherapy Balm Traditional 18g
description: Infused with scents of nature, TSB aroma balm is the perfect choice for a relaxing therapeutic massage, with traditional properties.
cleaned_text: You have no items in your shopping cart. Curated from a selection of natural ingredients, TSB Aromatherapy Balm comes with the scents of nature. Available in various soothing and effective scents, they are the perfect choice for all occasions, be it relaxing at home after a long day or spa owners pampering their clients with therapeutic massages. IngredientsMenthol, Essential oil blend, Peppermint oil, Eucalyptus oil, Wintergreen Oil, Camphor, Olive virgin oil, Base ad DirectionsApply directly to skin and massage gently. Cautionary InstructionsExternal use only. Do not use on exposed wounds. Discontinue if irritation occurs. Store in cool, dry place. Not recommended for children below the age of 2.
